body: If you read this any and all curses upon you and your families will be lifted. You will be blessed for the rest of your happy lives and won't need to worry about anything... THANK ME LATER.

Thank you for the summary! Now it makes sense in the end

This story is ten years or so after the first story https://nhentai.net/g/275438

It turned out, if you impregnate these zombie girls, there's a chance for them to turn back to human. So male zombie basically have no chance. So they start selling the zombie girls and graded. If the zombie girl turn back to human, must be returned and the money spent will be refunded. Also breaking these zombie is a crime. 

The protag neighbour were once zombie, but turned back to human. She found her elder sister so she bought it, and ask the protag to impregnate her and joined the threesome.
So like the last page mean they got hook up or something?
